inclusion.criterion: Cohort A Dose Escalation (Ribociclib + PDR001) Eligibility can be found in Detailed Description Section
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Participants must have normal organ and marrow function, as defined below:
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: AST(SGOT)/ALT(SGPT) ≤2.5 × IULN or ≤5 × IULN for participants with liver metastases
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: creatinine ≤1.5 x IULN or ≥ 60 ml/min/1.73m2 for subjects with creatinine levels above institutional normal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR) ≥ 30 mL/min/1.73 by either Cockcroft-Gault or CKD-EPI
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Participants cannot have been treated on a prior interventional, investigational study within 2 weeks of the first dose of study treatment.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Participants cannot receive treatment with any other investigational agents during protocol therapy.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Use of hematopoietic colony-stimulating growth factors (e.g. G-CSF, GMCSF, M-CSF) ≤2 weeks prior start of study drug.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of severe hypersensitivity reactions to other mAbs
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Participants requiring chronic treatment with systemic steroid therapy, other than replacement-dose steroids in the setting of adrenal insufficiency within 7 days of treatment initiation.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer. She has a 3 cm invasive ductal breast carcinoma in the left upper outer quadrant, which is HER2-positive and ER/PR negative. Axillary sampling revealed 5 positive lymph nodes. CXR was remarkable for metastatic lesions.
